general_advisory: Farmers are advised to prepare nursery bed and treat the paddy seeds. Mulch vegetable seedling to avoid cold injury. Provide light irrigation to standing vegetables and crops. Use pre-emergence herbicides. Various crop-specific advisories are provided for different stages.

advisory: Farmers should apply DAP, MOP, and Urea during last puddling for transplanting.
Seedlings should be transplanted at a specific spacing for high yielding varieties.
Infestations like White Grab and Stem rot can be controlled by specific treatments.
Specific fertilizers should be applied at planting and during top dressing to ensure proper growth.
To control hairy caterpillar, specific sprays are recommended.
Management advice for Dimond Back Moth and Head Borer infestations.
To control red palm weevil infestation, apply specific treatment.
Spray specific pesticides to control sigatoka leaf spot.
Preventive measures for EUS (Epizootic ulcerative syndrome) in winter.
